title: Crime Alert 12.20.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.20.18
description:
Killer dad Chris Watts' mistress Nichol Kessinger reportedly enters witness protection after receiving death threats. Jonathon Zicarelli tells police he drowned his six-month-old baby in an icy pond. A Washington judge delays sentencing of General Michael Flynn.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
